StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpdistpublisher
StoredProcedure.Description: Return properties of a Publisher that serves as its own Distributor

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpdistributiondb
StoredProcedure.Description: Return properties of the specified distribution database(s)

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpdistributor
StoredProcedure.Description: List information about the Distributor, distribution database, working directory, and SQL Server Agent user account

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpextendedproc
StoredProcedure.Description: Display the currently defined extended stored procedures and the name of the dynamic-link library to which the procedure (function) belongs

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpfile
StoredProcedure.Description: Return the physical names and attributes of files associated with the current database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpfilegroup
StoredProcedure.Description: Return the names and attributes of filegroups associated with the current database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpgroup
StoredProcedure.Description: Report information about a role, or all roles, in the current database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpindex
StoredProcedure.Description: Report information about the indexes on a table or view

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helplanguage
StoredProcedure.Description: Report information about a particular alternate language or about all languages

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helplinkedsrvlogin
StoredProcedure.Description: Provide information about login mappings defined against a specific linked server used for distributed queries and remote stored procedures

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helplogins
StoredProcedure.Description: Provide information about logins and the associated users in each database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpmergealternatepublisher
StoredProcedure.Description: Return a list of all servers enabled as alternate Publishers for merge publications

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpmergearticle
StoredProcedure.Description: Return information about an article

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpmergearticlecolumn
StoredProcedure.Description: Return the list of columns in the specified table or view article for a merge publication

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpmergearticleconflicts
StoredProcedure.Description: Return the articles in the publication that have conflicts

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpmergeconflictrows
StoredProcedure.Description: Return the rows in the specified conflict table

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpmergedeleteconflictrows
StoredProcedure.Description: Return the rows in the specified msmerge_delete_conflicts table

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpmergefilter
StoredProcedure.Description: Return information about merge filter(s)

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpmergepublication
StoredProcedure.Description: Return information about a merge publication

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpmergepullsubscription
StoredProcedure.Description: Return information about the pull subscription

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpmergesubscription
StoredProcedure.Description: Return information about a push subscription

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpntgroup
StoredProcedure.Description: Report information about Windows NT groups with accounts in the current database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helppublication
StoredProcedure.Description: Return information about a publication

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helppullsubscription
StoredProcedure.Description: Display information about one or more subscriptions at the Subscriber

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpremotelogin
StoredProcedure.Description: Report information about remote logins for a particular remote server, or for all remote servers, defined on the local server

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpreplfailovermode
StoredProcedure.Description: Display the current failover mode of a subscription for immediate updating with queued updating as a standby in case of a failure

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpreplicationdboption
StoredProcedure.Description: Show the databases that have the replication option enabled

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpreplicationoption
StoredProcedure.Description: Show the types of replication options enabled for a server

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helprole
StoredProcedure.Description: Return information about the roles in the current database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helprolemember
StoredProcedure.Description: Return information about the members of a role in the current database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helprotect
StoredProcedure.Description: Return a report with information about user permissions for an object, or statement permissions, in the current database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpserver
StoredProcedure.Description: Report information about a particular remote or replication server, or about all servers of both types

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpsrvrole
StoredProcedure.Description: Return a list of the SQL Server fixed server roles

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpsrvrolemember
StoredProcedure.Description: Return information about the members of a SQL Server fixed server role

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpstats
StoredProcedure.Description: Return statistics information about columns and indexes on the specified table

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpsubscriberinfo
StoredProcedure.Description: Display information about a Subscriber

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpsubscription
StoredProcedure.Description: List subscription information associated with a particular publication, article, Subscriber, or set of subscriptions

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpsubscription_properties
StoredProcedure.Description: Retrieve security information from the MSsubscription_properties table

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helptext
StoredProcedure.Description: Print the text of a rule, a default, or an unencrypted stored procedure, user-defined function, trigger, or view

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helptrigger
StoredProcedure.Description: Return the type or types of triggers defined on the specified table for the current database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_helpuser
StoredProcedure.Description: Report information about SQL Server users, Windows NT users, and database roles in the current database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_indexes
StoredProcedure.Description: Return index information for the specified remote table

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_indexoption
StoredProcedure.Description: Set option values for user-defined indexes

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_invalidate_textptr
StoredProcedure.Description: Make the specified in-row text pointer, or all in-row text pointers, in the transaction invalid

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_ivindexhasnullcols
StoredProcedure.Description: Validate that the clustered index of the indexed view is unique and does not contain any column that can be null when the indexed view is going to be used to create a transactional publication

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_link_publication
StoredProcedure.Description: Set the configuration and security information used by synchronization triggers of all updatable subscriptions when connecting to the Publisher

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_lock
StoredProcedure.Description: Report information about locks

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_makewebtask
StoredProcedure.Description: Create a task that produces an HTML document containing data returned by executed queries

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_marksubscriptionvalidation
StoredProcedure.Description: Mark the current open transaction to be a subscription level validation transaction for the specified subscriber

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_mergearticlecolumn
StoredProcedure.Description: Partition a merge publication vertically

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_mergecleanupmetadata
StoredProcedure.Description: Allow administrators to clean up meta data in the MSmerge_contents and MSmerge_tombstone system tables

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_mergedummyupdate
StoredProcedure.Description: Do a dummy update on the given row so that it will be sent again during the next merge

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_mergesubscription_cleanup
StoredProcedure.Description: Remove meta data such as triggers and entries in sysmergesubscriptions and sysmergearticles when a merge subscription is dropped at a Subscriber

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_msx_defect
StoredProcedure.Description: Remove the current server from multiserver operations

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_msx_enlist
StoredProcedure.Description: Add the current server to the list of target servers available for multiserver operations

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_password
StoredProcedure.Description: Add or changes a password for a SQL Server login

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_pkeys
StoredProcedure.Description: Return primary key information for a single table in the current environment

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_post_msx_operation
StoredProcedure.Description: Insert operations (rows) into the sysdownloadlist system table for target servers to download and execute

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_primarykeys
StoredProcedure.Description: Return the primary key columns, one row per key column, for the specified remote table

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_processmail
StoredProcedure.Description: Use extended stored procedures (xp_findnextmsg, xp_readmail, and xp_deletemail) to process incoming mail messages (expected to be only a single query) from the inbox for SQL Server

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_procoption
StoredProcedure.Description: Set procedure options

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_publication_validation
StoredProcedure.Description: Initiate an article validation request for each article in the specified publication

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_purge_jobhistory
StoredProcedure.Description: Remove the history records for a job

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_recompile
StoredProcedure.Description: Cause stored procedures and triggers to be recompiled the next time they are run

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_refreshsubscriptions
StoredProcedure.Description: Add subscriptions to new articles in a pull subscription for all the existing Subscribers to the publication

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_reinitmergepullsubscription
StoredProcedure.Description: Mark a merge pull subscription for reinitialization the next time the Merge Agent runs

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_reinitmergesubscription
StoredProcedure.Description: Mark a merge subscription for reinitialization the next time the Merge Agent runs

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_reinitpullsubscription
StoredProcedure.Description: Mark a transactional pull or anonymous subscription for reinitialization the next time the Distribution Agent runs

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_reinitsubscription
StoredProcedure.Description: Mark the subscription for reinitialization

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_releaseapplock
StoredProcedure.Description: Release a lock on an application resource

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_remoteoption
StoredProcedure.Description: Display or change options for a remote login defined on the local server running SQL Server

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_removedbreplication
StoredProcedure.Description: Remove all replication objects from a database without updating data at the Distributor

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_rename
StoredProcedure.Description: Change the name of a user-created object (for example, table, column, or user-defined data type) in the current database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_renamedb
StoredProcedure.Description: Change the name of a database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_repladdcolumn
StoredProcedure.Description: Add a column to an existing table article that has been published

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_repldropcolumn
StoredProcedure.Description: Drop a column from an existing table article that has been published

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_replication_agent_checkup
StoredProcedure.Description: Check each distribution database for replication agents that are running but have not logged history within the specified heartbeat interval

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_replicationdboption
StoredProcedure.Description: Set a replication database option for the current database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_replshowcmds
StoredProcedure.Description: Return the commands for transactions marked for replication in readable format

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_resetstatus
StoredProcedure.Description: Reset the status of a suspect database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_resolve_logins
StoredProcedure.Description: Resolve logins on the new primary server against logins from the former primary server

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_restoredbreplication
StoredProcedure.Description: Remove replication settings if restoring a database to the non-originating server, database, or system that is otherwise not capable of running replication processes

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_resync_targetserver
StoredProcedure.Description: Resynchronize all multiserver jobs in the specified target server

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_resyncmergesubscription
StoredProcedure.Description: Resynchronize a merge subscription to a known validation state that you specify

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_revoke_publication_access
StoredProcedure.Description: Remove the login from a publications access list

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_revokedbaccess
StoredProcedure.Description: Remove a security account from the current database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_revokelogin
StoredProcedure.Description: Remove the login entries from SQL Server for a Windows NT user or group created with sp_grantlogin or sp_denylogin

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_runwebtask
StoredProcedure.Description: Execute a previously defined Web job and generates the HTML document

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_script_synctran_commands
StoredProcedure.Description: Generate a script that contains the sp_addsynctrigger calls to be applied at Subscribers for updatable subscriptions

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_scriptsubconflicttable
StoredProcedure.Description: Generate script for creating a conflict table on the Subscriber for a given queued subscription article

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_server_info
StoredProcedure.Description: Return a list of attribute names and matching values for SQL Server, the database gateway, or the underlying data source

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_serveroption
StoredProcedure.Description: Set server options for remote servers and linked servers

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_setapprole
StoredProcedure.Description: Activate the permissions associated with an application role in the current database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_setnetname
StoredProcedure.Description: Set the network names in sysservers to their actual network computer names for remote instances of SQL Server

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_setreplfailovermode
StoredProcedure.Description: Allow you to set the failover operation mode for subscriptions enabled for immediate updating with queued updating as failover

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_settriggerorder
StoredProcedure.Description: Specify which AFTER triggers associated with a table will be fired first or last

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_spaceused
StoredProcedure.Description: Display the number of rows, disk space reserved, and disk space used by a table in the current database, or displays the disk space reserved and used by the entire database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_special_columns
StoredProcedure.Description: Return the optimal set of columns that uniquely identify a row in the table

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_sproc_columns
StoredProcedure.Description: Return column information for a single stored procedure or user-defined function in the current environment

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_srvrolepermission
StoredProcedure.Description: Return the permissions applied to a fixed server role

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_start_job
StoredProcedure.Description: Instructs SQL Server Agent to execute a job immediately

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_statistics
StoredProcedure.Description: Return a list of all indexes and statistics on a specified table or indexed view

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_stored_procedures
StoredProcedure.Description: Return a list of stored procedures in the current environment

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_subscription_cleanup
StoredProcedure.Description: Remove meta data when a subscription is dropped at a Subscriber

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_table_privileges
StoredProcedure.Description: Return a list of table permissions (such as INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, SELECT, REFERENCES) for the specified table(s)

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_table_privileges_ex
StoredProcedure.Description: Return privilege information about the specified table from the specified linked server

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_table_validation
StoredProcedure.Description: Either returns rowcount or checksum information on a table or indexed view, or compares the provided rowcount or checksum information with the specified table or indexed view

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_tableoption
StoredProcedure.Description: Set option values for user-defined tables. sp_tableoption may be used to turn on the text in row feature on tables with text, ntext, or image columns

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_tables
StoredProcedure.Description: Return a list of objects that can be queried in the current environment (any object that can appear in a FROM clause)

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_tables_ex
StoredProcedure.Description: Return table information about the tables from the specified linked server

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_unbindefault
StoredProcedure.Description: Unbind (removes) a default from a column or from a user-defined data type in the current database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_unbindrule
StoredProcedure.Description: Unbind a rule from a column or a user-defined data type in the current database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_update_alert
StoredProcedure.Description: Update the settings of an existing alert

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_update_category
StoredProcedure.Description: Changes the name of a category

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_update_jobstep
StoredProcedure.Description: Change the setting for a step in a job that is used to perform automated activities

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_update_log_shipping_plan
StoredProcedure.Description: Update information about an existing log shipping plan

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_update_log_shipping_plan_database
StoredProcedure.Description: Update an existing database that is part of a log shipping plan

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_update_targetservergroup
StoredProcedure.Description: Change the name of the specified target server group

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_updateextendedproperty
StoredProcedure.Description: Update the value of an existing extended property

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_updatestats
StoredProcedure.Description: Run UPDATE STATISTICS against all user-defined tables in the current database

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_validatemergepublication
StoredProcedure.Description: Perform a publication-wide validation for which all subscriptions (push, pull, and anonymous) will be validated once

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_validatemergesubscription
StoredProcedure.Description: Perform a validation for the specified subscription

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_validname
StoredProcedure.Description: Check for valid SQL Server identifier names

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_who
StoredProcedure.Description: Provide information about current SQL Server users and processes

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_xml_preparedocument
StoredProcedure.Description: Reads the Extensible Markup Language (XML) text provided as input, then parses the text using the MSXML parser, and provides the parsed document in a state ready for consumption

StoredProcedure.Name: sp_xml_removedocument
StoredProcedure.Description: Removes the internal representation of the XML document specified by the document handle and invalidates the document handle

StoredProcedure.Name: xp_cmdshell
StoredProcedure.Description: Executes a given command string as an operating-system command shell and returns any output as rows of text
